dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4016428B] my kiss images/copyrights being violated on Photorazzi.com
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at
www.theplanet.com/about_us/legal_docs/ThePlanet%20Copyright%20Infringeme
nt%2001%2015%2007%20FINAL.pdf
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com]

To: Copyright
Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C4016428B] my kiss images/copyrights being
violated on Photorazzi.com

==== Forwarded Ticket ====

MIME element (text/plain) 
you have pictures of mine from the 1979 kiss dynasty tour on your
website. 
 
you are VIOLATING MY COPYRIGHTS and you need to step up and pay, credit
or REMOVE my photos at once. 
 
you have your copyright on my photos... without my permission. you did
not ask 
you did not credit me, you did not pay me... 
 
you have stolen and violated my copyrights and each photo i can sue for
$1,500.00 
per image... you need to contact me at once. 
 
not answerring your phone is not gonna work. 
 
edd- 
 
 
 Andy Rouvalis at 1-866-551-7827 ext.1 or you can email him at:
andy@photorazzi.com. Again thank you for the interest in our photos. 
 
Thank You, 
Photorazzi.com 
"Your Access To Hollywood!"
